thread.title: TS Tech Named to Lehigh Valley Business Fastest Growing Companies List
thread.title_full: TS Tech Named to Lehigh Valley Business Fastest Growing Companies List - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: TS Tech Named to Lehigh Valley Business Fastest Growing Companies List
text:
TS Technology Enterprises, a Reading, PA-based organization that provides managed IT services to small and mid-sized businesses throughout southern Pennsylvania has been named as one of the Lehigh Valley Business’ Fastest Growing Companies for 2015.
BETHLEHEM, PA (PRWEB) October 10, 2015
TS Technology Enterprises, a Reading, PA-based organization that provides managed IT services to small and mid-sized businesses throughout southern Pennsylvania has been named as one of the Lehigh Valley Business’ Fastest Growing Companies for 2015. The company will be honored at a special awards ceremony on October 28, 2015 at DeSales University.
With their inclusion on this list, TS Technology joins 29 other Lehigh Valley-based businesses that have shown a propensity for substantial growth over the past three fiscal years. Lehigh Valley Business will release the final growth rankings at the awards ceremony on October 28.
Nominated companies are ranked according to revenue growth over a three-year period; taking into account both dollar and percentage increases. To be eligible, businesses needed to conduct business within the Greater Lehigh Valley and have a revenue greater than $500,000 each of the past three years, while showing growth from 2012 to 2014.
For a complete list of honorees, click here .
About Lehigh Valley Business
Lehigh Valley Business is an independently owned and award-winning regional newspaper that provides more information, more analysis, and more advice than any other Bethlehem-based media outlet. Currently Lehigh Valley Business has been serving the residents of Lehigh Valley for over 23 years and is the most widely read local business publication in the region. LVB currently has a circulation of 10,000 and a total readership of approximately 35,000.
About Todd Schorle and TS Tech
Todd Schorle is the President and founder of TS Tech Enterprises, Inc., a Wyomissing-based IT firm in Berks County Pennsylvania. TS Tech specializes in providing comprehensive technology solutions for small businesses and supplemental IT department services to medium-sized business clients.
For more information, contact TS Technology at (610)288-0780 or visit: http://www.ts-tech.com .
